name: DEFINITELY NOT ARKANOID
description:
DEFINITELY NOT ARKANIOID is an arkanoid clone in which you move the board instead of the paddle.

The rules are the same as in a regular arkanoid,
if the ball touches the bottom of the board, you lose a life.
You start the game with 3 lives and zero points.
For every level you pass, you receive 10 points and the paddle shrinks.
After every 10 levels, the paddle returns to its original size and the game speeds up.
For every 250 points scored you receive an additional life.
You lose when the number of lives drops to 0.

And that's it.

You can play it in your browser or download the EXE and play on your computer.

Controls:

-WASD or arrows - board control

-F1 - fullscreen (does not work in browser)

-Esc - back to the menu

If you are interested, most of the sounds (including the music) come from freesounds.org

If you find any bugs, let me know about them
